result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Melvin J Hervey Jr

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Melvin J Hervey Jr in court.  Attorney Joseph Thomas Domask in court for Melvin J Hervey Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Nate Kristian McClure in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for pretrial conference.
Defense counsel has not received discovery and an offer from the state. 
Defendant has pending matters 22CM2584 in Branch 29 and 22CF3876 in Branch 9. 
Defense counsel requests additional time. Court grants request.
Case adjourned to Branch 13.
Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 37, Judge Dee in Room 515 of the Courthouse.
Status conference scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report, filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Melvin J Hervey Jr appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Amanda Poznanski appeared by video for Melvin J Hervey Jr.  Attorney Gregg Herman appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Judge, Branch 13.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned to Branch 13.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Melvin J Hervey Jr
Current: 3902 N 5th St, Upper, Milwaukee, WI 53212 United States  (Effective: 10-06-2022)
Prior: 3251 North 1st Street, Milwaukee, WI 53212
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
